note.p: Career: English master, Collegiate School, Leicester; travelled to the Amazon with Henry Walter Bates (FRS 1881) (1848-1852)
Medals/Prizes: Darwin Medal 1890; Royal Medal 1868; Copley 1908
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1923-1924 vol 95 pp i-xxxv, plate, signed by E B P
References: H J Habakkuk, 'Thomas Robert Malthus, FRS (1766-1834)' in NR 1959 vol 14 pp 99-108
C F A Pantin, 'Alfred Russel Wallace, FRS, and His Essays of 1858 and 1855' in NR 1959 vol 14 pp 67-84, plate
A Cohen, 'Roland Trimen and the merope harem' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 205-218
T Quinn, 'From Darwin and Wallace to the discovery of Invar' in NR 2005 vol 59 pp 121-123
M Bulmer, 'The theory of natural selection of Alfred Russel Wallace FRS' in NR 2005 vol 59 pp 125-136
Charles H Smit, 'Wallace, Darwin and Ternate 1858' in NR 2014, vol 68, no. 2, pp 165-170
D Cicuzza 'A rediscovery of Alfred Russel Wallace's fern collection from Borneo at the Cambridge University Herbarium' in NR 2014, vol 68, no 4, pp 403-412
